title: Gigi Hadid and Bachelorette heartthrob Tyler Cameron have split
text:
Bachelorette runner-up Tyler Cameron and model Gigi Hadid are no longer dating, according to an insider who spoke to Entertainment Tonight.

The reality star and catwalk queen were first spotted together in early August.

Cameron rose to prominence during his stint on Hannah Brown's season of The Bachelorette, where he came in second place.

Splitsville: Tyler Cameron and Gigi Hadid have broken up after less than two-months together

It seemed that the duo got quite close over their short time together.

They appeared almost inseparable during their regular dates around New York.

While seen bowling with friends, an eyewitness told Us Weekly that the duo was 'flirty the entire night and they were clearly focused on one another.'

Another source told the magazine that the cover girl was 'really into' Cameron.

Cameron even accompanied Hadid to her grandmother's funeral in the Netherlands back in early September.

This was the star's first relationship since her split from on-off beau Zayn Malik.

Better times: Gigi and Tyler were first seen together in early August. The former couple are seen above August 14

At her side: Tyler accompanied Gigi to her grandmother's funeral in the Netherlands last month. Above he's seen comforting the model

Non-answer: break-up news comes just after Cameron coyly sidestepped a question about his dating life during a stop by Watch What Happens Live With Andy Cohen Tuesday night

Despite the breakup, Tyler seemed in good spirits as he celebrated National Vodka and Taco Day with Smirnoff Vodka on Thursday.

The looker was ultra-relaxed as he laid back on a couch to nibble on Taco Bell while sipping on a pink Smirnoff cocktail.

He did an expert job of hiding any sadness as he got the chance to eat his feelings.

News of the Tyler-Gigi split comes as some what of a surprise.

Smiling: Cameron didn't look like he was lovelorn while out in New York that day

Chin up: Despite the breakup, Tyler seemed in good spirits as he celebrated National Vodka and Taco Day with Smirnoff Vodka on Thursday

What a snack: The looker was ultra-relaxed as he laid back on a couch to nibble on Taco Bell while sipping on a pink Smirnoff cocktail

On the town: The night before Tyler was seen spending some time with fans in Times Square

Messy eater: Tyler spilled lettuce and cheese all over himself

Therapy: He did an expert job of hiding any sadness as he got the chance to eat his feelings

Reality persona/amateur model Tyler recently relocated to Lower East Side of Manhattan, a New York neighborhood close to Hadid's home.

But break-up news comes just after Cameron coyly sidestepped a question about his dating life during a stop by Watch What Happens Live With Andy Cohen Tuesday night.

When guest Jenny McCarthy asked if he was 'available', the hunky Florida native replied 'I may be single.'

He kept vague about Gigi the next day during a chat with E!'s Daily Pop.

Friendly: Tyler had previously tried to keep private about the pairing, telling ET last month that he and Gigi are 'just friends'

Asked about the catwalker, he said 'That's my friend,' before going on to tell the hosts: 'We hung out a few times. She's doing her thing now in Paris and killin' it so...'

Tyler had previously tried to keep private about the pairing, telling ET last month that he and Gigi are 'just friends.'

'I mean... that's just where we're at. Our relationship doesn't need to be public,' he said. 'She's good people, she's an amazing person and we're just keeping it friendly.'

'I'm at the point where I don't really want to talk about my relationships,' Cameron, who also works as a model, added. 'I've dated publicly, so... I'm trying to date privately and I'm not in love with anybody right now. I'm in love with myself.'

Rosy: Cameron's relationship with Gigi came on the heels of his tenure on The Bachelorette, where he bid for the heart of former beauty pageant queen Hannah Brown

Cameron's relationship with Gigi came on the heels of his tenure on The Bachelorette, where he bid for the heart of former beauty pageant queen Hannah Brown.

Though he didn't originally win her final rose, Tyler and Hannah reconnected after Brown dumped winner Jed Wyatt for lying to her.

Tyler caused a stir after he was seen sneaking out of Hannah's apartment in the morning.

But the highly sought-after hunk was seen rendezvous-ing with Hadid just days later.

Brown, who is currently a contestant on Dancing With The Stars, didn't mask her irritation when asked about the pair last month.

'Thank you, next,' she told Us Weekly when asked about Tyler back in August.
description: The reality star and catwalk queen were first spotted together in early August. Cameron rose to prominence during his stint on Hannah Brown's season of The Bachelorette.
